text: Boyhood is a 2014 American drama movie. The story is about a boy growing up with divorced parents. Ethan Hawke plays Dad. Patricia Arquette plays Mom. The movie took 12 years to make. It won the Golden Globe Award for Best Motion Picture in 2015. This movie was released in July 2014. title: Boyhood (movie)
